results.content: Allthough a lot of information about social media web development can be found on https://developers.facebook.com/products/social-plugins, https://dev.twitter.com/cards, https://developers.google.com/+/web/share/ and https://developer.linkedin.com/docs/share-on-linkedin, this course has added value and everything is explained very clear. The only thing I miss, is that there's nothing said about Android and iOS / mobile devices, for which you might handle it in a different way than for desktops or laptops.

results.content: This is a topic that is not well covered in other courses.  The instructor is well informed provides excellent examples of how to use the code.  This course makes sense for any web developer to learn more about social which can sometimes be overwhelming.  There are many social sites and all have different code.  HIGH RECOMMENDED COURSE
